verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Make me an instrument,
An instrument of worship.
I lift up my hands in Thy name.
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, tune me, Your instrument,
Your instrument of worship.
I lift up my hands in Your name.
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
(Key Rises 1 Whole Step)
Lord, make us a symphony,
A symphony of worship.
We lift up our hands in Thy name.
(Repeat.)
